text: Molavi Ahmad Narouie (1963 — 18 March 2014; in Persian: مولوی احمد نارویی) was a notable Iranian Sunni theologian, human rights activist, journalist and a vice president of Zahedan seminary. He was a prominent Sunni theologian and expert on Islamic jurisprudence. Ahmad Narouie is also a social and human rights activist in Sistan and Baluchistan Province. ==See also== *Islam in Iran *Molavi Abdul Hamid == References == Category:Iranian clerics Category:People from Zahedan Category:Iranian Sunni Muslims Category:Sunni Muslim scholars Category:1963 births Category:2014 deaths
title: Molavi Ahmad Narouei
